mapper.insert: insert into company_employee (id, company_uuid, user_uuid, gender, name, email, phone, education, ismarriage, native, isparty, entry_time, quit_time, add_time, img_face, new_img, wuye_uuid, state, company, department, position, program_num, URL_address, address, telephone, mobile_phone, is_company_acount) values (#{id}, #{companyUuid}, #{userUuid}, #{gender}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{education}, #{ismarriage}, #{native}, #{isparty}, #{entryTime}, #{quitTime}, #{addTime}, #{imgFace}, #{newImg}, #{wuyeUuid}, #{state}, #{company}, #{department}, #{position}, #{programNum}, #{urlAddress}, #{address}, #{telephone}, #{mobilePhone}, #{isCompanyAcount})
mapper.update: update company_employee set company_uuid = #{companyUuid}, user_uuid = #{userUuid}, gender = #{gender}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, education = #{education}, ismarriage = #{ismarriage}, native = #{native}, isparty = #{isparty}, entry_time = #{entryTime}, quit_time = #{quitTime}, add_time = #{addTime}, img_face = #{imgFace}, new_img = #{newImg}, wuye_uuid = #{wuyeUuid}, state = #{state}, company = #{company}, department = #{department}, position = #{position}, program_num = #{programNum}, URL_address = #{urlAddress}, address = #{address}, telephone = #{telephone}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone}, is_company_acount = #{isCompanyAcount} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, company_uuid, user_uuid, gender, name, email, phone, education, ismarriage, native, isparty, entry_time, quit_time, add_time, img_face, new_img, wuye_uuid, state, company, department, position, program_num, URL_address, address, telephone, mobile_phone, is_company_acount from company_employee where id = #{id}

select id, company_uuid, user_uuid, gender, name, email, phone, education, ismarriage, native, isparty, entry_time, quit_time, add_time, img_face, new_img, wuye_uuid, state, company, department, position, program_num, URL_address, address, telephone, mobile_phone, is_company_acount from company_employee
SELECT * FROM company_employee ce where !ISNULL(ce.company_uuid) and ce.is_company_acount = 'æ˜¯' order BY ce.company_uuid
